A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was hoping the audience reviews were off\, but I gotta say The Last Jedi was a swing and a miss.  It's rather baffling what Disney was trying to accomplish\, Kylo moves forward as the weak \"strongest presence of the force\" that is just a gigantic let down and Rey continues to have little to no training but gets the better of Kylo constantly.  Why can't we get a good Star Wars film worthy of the originals?
